results.title: True justice?
results.brief_description: Documentary containing sensitive material about the death, in 2004, of a young 17 year-old Aboriginal boy from Gamilaroi country (Walgett) known as TJ Hickey. Through interviews and news footage, the film attempts to establish the truth of what really happened to TJ whose “acccidental” death not only triggered a riot between the Redfern community and the police, but also conspiracy theories, rumours and media misinformation.
results.description: Documentary containing sensitive material about the death, in 2004, of a young 17 year-old Aboriginal boy from Gamilaroi country (Walgett) known as TJ Hickey. Through interviews and news footage, the film attempts to establish the truth of what really happened to TJ whose “acccidental” death not only triggered a riot between the Redfern community and the police, but also conspiracy theories, rumours and media misinformation.
description_for_label: Documentary containing sensitive material about the death, in 2004, of a young 17 year-old Aboriginal boy from Gamilaroi country (Walgett) known as TJ Hickey. Through interviews and news footage, the film attempts to establish the truth of what really happened to TJ whose “acccidental” death not only triggered a riot between the Redfern community and the police, but also conspiracy theories, rumours and media misinformation.

results.title: Too little justice
results.creator_credit: Marcus Waters, Justin Davies, Dean Francis and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
“Everyday” racism escalates into violence as an indigenous school boy is forced to fight for dignity. When he is framed for drugs by a racist student, he realizes he is trapped in a cycle of systemic cultural bias.
Cast: George Barker, Shannon Cole
results.creator_credit_for_label: Marcus Waters, Justin Davies, Dean Francis and AFTRS

results.title: Range of experience
results.creator_credit: Lisa Duff, Marc Gillezeau, Maryella Hatfield and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
It is the future - a world where the ability to experience life’s basic emotions has been lost to humanity and Virtual Reality has replaced dreams. The company Range of Experience Productions Inc has invented the Dream Base Selector, a machine which enables users to re-live experiences once created naturally by the subconscious mind. But it soon becomes apparent that the technology is slightly faulty…
Cast: Soledad Cordeaux
results.creator_credit_for_label: Lisa Duff, Marc Gillezeau, Maryella Hatfield and AFTRS

results.title: Left lane ends
results.creator_credit: Alice Addison, Steve Pasvolsky, Sofya Gollan and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
Not paid sex, not Sleep-Eez, not working the late-night shift can help Danny sleep. Not until his ritual gets invaded by a girl.
Cast: Sam Lewis, Kate Beahan, Kris McQuade, Russell Cheek

results.title: The Lama of Greystanes
results.brief_description:
Zatul Rinzin Rinpoche is the 11th reincarnation of the lama (or spiritual leader) of the highest monastery in the world, Rongbuk, which lies at the foot of Mount Everest in western Tibet.
In 1959, when the Chinese invaded Tibet, Rinzin was forced to flee his homeland. Now 57, he lives in Greystanes in the outer western suburbs of Sydney with his wife and three children.
Rinzin is no longer a monk but he is still a lama - a responsibility he must hold his entire life. He now works as a security guard to support himself, his family and his monastery back in Tibet.

results.title: Grace
results.creator_credit: Alice Addison, Isabel Perez, Damien Power and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
A lonely girl left looking after the family motel finds her life is about to change when a sophisticated and elegant woman books in for the night.
Cast: Mariel McClovey, Angela Punch McGregor, Tim Richards

results.title: Gods Bones
results.creator_credit: Catherine Sinclair, Samantha Lang and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
Angie is pregnant but who is the father? Is it the taxi-driver, the businessman, the actor or the medical student? The potential fathers-to-be are all in for an unexpected mail delivery - a letter with an unusual little parcel. A reminder of what could have been. Based on a short story by Yasunari Kawabata.
Cast: Olivia Pigeot, Brian Vriends, Bogdan Koga, Ritchie Singer, Kiri Paramore

results.title: Goblin market
results.creator_credit: Megan Harding, Belinda Hall, Rachel Perkins and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
“Morning and evening
maids heard the goblin cry,
come buy our orchid fruits
come buy, come buy”
Goblin market by Christina Rossetti
Adapted from the poem by Christina Rosette about an age-old myth as seen through contemporary Australian eyes.
Cast: Rachel Maza (Laura), Lisa Maza (Lizzie)
results.creator_credit_for_label: Megan Harding, Belinda Hall, Rachel Perkins and AFTRS

results.title: Glass
results.creator_credit: Jacqui North, Safina Uberoi and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
He is an obessive bookmaker. She is addicted to talk-back radio. A film about love, loneliness and the dark magic of dreams.
Cast: Odile Le Clezio, Lech Mackiewicz, Dean Vassallo
